Asahi's history dates back to 1889 ... with Asahi Breweries becoming a separate company in 1949. Today, it is the largest brewer in Japan with a head office in Tokyo, 147 subsidiaries globally and 95 manufacturing plants. The Group employs about 31,600 employees around the globe.
